name: 24 Inch Oscillating Misting Wall Mount Fan, Extra Long 3.9ft Wired Remote and 9.8ft Power Cord, IP44 Industrial Commercial Wall Mounted Fan for Greenhouse, Garage, Workshop, Covered Patio
short_description: Easy Control & Flexible Mounting: Replace fragile 2.6ft pull chain with an extended 3.9ft wired remote for durable, smooth operation from distance. The extra-long 9.8ft power cord satisfies most distance needs, while wall-mounted design saves space. Customize your cooling from a gentle breeze to a powerful gust with 3-speed control.

Far-Reaching Airflow & Space-Saving Design: 30ft airflow (50% farther than others) and 90° oscillation eliminate dead zones. Aerodynamic blades boost efficiency. Perfect for outdoor covered places or industrial settings requiring powerful ventilation.

Dual-Function Misting & Low Maintenance: Misting and airflow cools fast—no extra equipment. Smooth blades and detachable grilles reduce dust, simplifying cleaning for workshops/commercial spaces. Spend less time cleaning, more time on what matters.

Industrial-Grade Durability & Efficiency: Lightweight aluminum blades and permanently lubricated dual-ball bearing copper motor resist corrosion, dissipate heat. IP44-rated withstands dust/splashes, cutting maintenance and solving traditional fans' motor failure from dust/moisture.

Triple Safety & Commercial Reliability: A stable wall mount minimizes vibration, while heavy-duty safety latches, safety screw, and overheat protection ensure safety in crowded or complex environments. This oscillating fan is ideal for garage, greenhouse, gym, chicken coop, horse barn, shop, or covered outdoor spaces like gazebo, patio, pergola, and porch.
